business.headline: Elon Musk leads Hurun Global Rich List despite $100 billion drop in net worthElon Musk has reretained his position as the wealthiest person in the world for the fourth time in five years, becoming the first individual to surpass the $400 billion threshold, noted the Hurun Research report.

US tariff reprieve for India, may not be treated like China, Canada, Mexico: SourcesTrade talks between the two nations are progressing smoothly, with no deadlock expected before the April 2 deadline for US reciprocal tariffs.

Infosys terminates more trainees from Mysuru campus, but offers…: ReportInfosys has terminated more trainees from its Myrusu campus. The IT giant had terminated hundreds of trainees from the same campus just two months ago.

Tata Motors shares slump as US slaps 25% duty on car importsTata Motors stock price: Tata Motors shares slumped 6% in early trade and were trading 5.26% lower at Rs 670.70 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) at 9.55 am.

Sensex, Nifty gain after opening lower in volatile trade; Wipro rises nearly 2%Stock market opening: While the Sensex opened 100 points lower, it was trading 64.27 points higher at 77,552.77 at around 9.26 am. The Nifty50 was trading 16.75 points higher at 23,503.60.

Top stocks to watch today: Tata Motors, Wipro, JB Chemicals, Infosys, Vedanta, UPLWhile positive cues are likely to support the two leading indices on Dalal Street, US tariff uncertainty looms large. Here are some of the key stocks that will be in focus today.

Stock market on March 27: What to expect from Sensex, Nifty today?Stock market prediction: Nifty and Sensex have gained nearly 2% in the past five sessions, but investors will now be watching to see if the market can recover from Wednesday's drop.

How can India cement its position in the global value chain?With global value chains (GVCs) driving over 70% of international trade, India's growth story hinges on its ability to integrate into and scale within these networks.

Tesla to enter Saudi Arabia as Elon Musk mends rift with kingdomAmerican EV giant Tesla announced its entry into the Saudi Arabian market after company CEO Elon Musk's relations with the Kingdom improved in recent months.

UPI outage hits several users across India, NPCI says issue resolvedThe National Payments Corporation of India (NPCI) acknowledged the issue, stating that it was caused by intermittent technical difficulties, resulting in partial transaction failures.
Wall Street is drifting again after getting whipsawed for weeksThe New York Stock Exchange saw a steady opening on Wednesday with marginal drops for S&P 500 and the Nasdaq composite.

Cancer, diabetes drugs under government price control to get costlier: SourcesGovernment-controlled medicines, including that of cancer, diabetes, heart-related concerns and other antibiotics, are set to become more expensive by 1.7 per cent, government sources told India Today TV's sister publication, Business Today.

entertainment.headline: Ram Charan turns 40: Jr NTR, Mahesh Babu and actors share sweet birthday wishesActor Ram Charan marked his 40th birthday on March 27. On the special day, actors, including Mahesh Babu, Jr NTR, Janhvi Kapoor, and Chiranjeevi, extended heartwarming wishes.

Intimate messages between Kim Soo-hyun and Kim Sae-ron from 2016 leaked: ReportA bunch of intimate messages allegedly exchanged between K-drama actors Kim Soo-hyun and Kim Sae-ron have been shared by the late actor's family during a recent press meet.

Hansal Mehta hesitant to send his daughters away after watching AdolescenceHansal Mehta says Adolescence changed his perspective on parenting. The Netflix series left him shaken, increasing his interactions with his daughters and making him hesitant to send them away for studies.

Explained: Why Mohanlal's Sabarimala puja for Mammootty triggered row over 'faith' Actor Mohanlal recently offered special prayers for his friend Mammootty at the Sabarimala temple in Kerala. Now, a row has erupted over his gesture towards his friend.

Emraan Hashmi's Ground Zero gets release date, new poster unveiledEmraan Hashmi's next, Ground Zero, is set to release in April. On March 27, the makers announced the release date with an intriguing poster of the actor.

SRK fan tries to breach security at IPL to meet actor, gets thrashed by policeA fan tried to breach security at the IPL 2025 opening match to meet Shah Rukh Khan. However, his attempts landed in vain when police thrashed him for his attempt.

Empuraan X review: Stunning visuals and action, but fans split over 2nd halfL2: Empuraan opened to massive fan reactions, with many praising its visuals and action-packed second half. However, some felt it turned into a formulaic revenge drama. The film is set for a big box office run.

Actor Vikram's wife admits she has a favourite, and it's not her husbandIn a light-hearted revelation, Tamil actor Vikram shared that his wife often compares his skills to actor Mohanlal's, always finding the latter superior. Vikram is gearing up for the release of his upcoming film Veera Dheera Sooran.

Ram Charan's next with Janhvi titled Peddi, makers share his gritty 1st look posterActor Ram Charan's first look from the upcoming film titled Peddi is out. The makers treated fans with the news on the actor's 40th birthday today.

Salman Khan on death threats: Life lately is home, shooting films, homeSalman Khan, who has received several death threats, said he believes in God and will live as long as destined. However, he finds heavy security challenging at times.

Snow White producer's son slams Rachel Zegler's political remarks: She hurt the filmSnow White producer Marc Platt's eldest son, Jonah Platt, slammed actor Rachel Zegler and blamed her for the film's poor box office performance.

Mohanlal watches first show of L2: Empuraan with fans, Prithviraj and son PranavMohanlal watched Empuraan's first show with fans, Pranav Mohanlal, and Prithviraj Sukumaran in Kochi. The film released on Thursday amid much fanfare.

Priyanka Chopra's New York photo dump is all about daughter's makeup artist skillsPriyanka Chopra shared pictures from her quick New York visit featuring her husband-singer, Nick Jonas, and daughter, Malti Marie. The photo dump highlighted the actor's cute moments with her daughter, which is sure to leave fans in awe.

Salman Khan on working with Pakistani artistes: Get permission, I'm readySalman Khan says he is open to working with Pakistani artistes if the government permits it. The actor addressed the topic while promoting Sikandar, which releases on March 30.

Javed Akhtar defends Mohanlal-Mammootty, slams petty people in Sabarimala puja rowJaved Akhtar appreciated Mohanlal and Mammootty's friendship in an X post. Recently, Mohanlal performing a puja for his friend Mammootty at the Sabarimala temple sparked controversy over faith.

Salman Khan reveals why he, SRK and Aamir Khan can never star in a film togetherSalman Khan, in an interaction ahead of Sikandar's release, said that Shah Rukh Khan, Aamir Khan and himself can never star in a film together. He then explained the reason why it is not possible.

Marvel Studios confirms Avengers Doomsday cast as production beginsMarvel Studios has kicked off production for Avengers Doomsday, revealing an impressive lineup of returning and new cast members. The film is set to hit theatres in May 2026, promising a thrilling addition to the MCU.

Salman Khan's film with Atlee delayed due to budget constraintsSalman Khan's collaboration with Atlee has been postponed as the film's budget undergoes reassessment. The actor confirmed the delay during a recent press meet.

Lady Gaga's Mayhem Ball tour 2025: Dates, cities & ticket sales informationLady Gaga announces her Mayhem Ball tour, hitting North America, Europe, and the UK in 2025. The highly anticipated arena tour promises an intimate, theatrical experience, with tickets selling fast.

The irony: Stalin hits back in language rowTamil Nadu Chief Minister MK Stalin hit back at Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath for criticising the DMK's stand on delimitation and language policy, calling the BJP's response hypocritical and dubbing it "political black comedy at its darkest."

'Big catch' in Ranya Rao case: Gold dealer who abetted smuggling arrestedThe Directorate of Revenue Intelligence (DRI) arrested a key suspect in the Ranya Rao smuggling case for allegedly disposing of smuggled gold. They got custody of him for four days to probe the wider network.

Uber, Ola's new competitor. Government's 'Sahkar Taxi' that will benefit driversThe government's upcoming 'Sahkar Taxi' will empower drivers with direct profit without intermediaries taking a cut from their earnings.

Bengal woman thrashed by brick over parking dispute, links accused with TrinamoolThe woman alleged that Tinku Mondal, allegedly linked to Trinamool Congress, attacked her with a brick in North 24 Parganas district over a parking dispute.
Mahindra's ex-MD buys XEV 9e, led legendary Scorpio's developmentMahindra launched two new BEVs, the XEV 9e and the BE 6, in November 2024.
Perseverance rover discovers strange rock filled with spheres on MarsThe rover successfully sampled nearby light-toned beds before spotting this unusual rock on March 11, 2025.

Ghibli-style pictures trend on X, thanks to ChatGPT's image generation featureIf you open X (formerly Twitter) right now, you are sure to come across at least one post with a Ghibli-style image. If you have been wondering why that is, it's thanks to ChatGPT's new image generation feature that launched on Tuesday.

PM writes to Bangladesh's Yunus on National Day, stresses 'mutual sensitivity'PM Modi extended National Day greetings to Bangladesh, reaffirming India's commitment to bilateral ties while stressing mutual sensitivity to concerns.

Infighting, adjustment politics will take Karnataka BJP to new low: Expelled MLAExpelled BJP MLA Basangouda Patil Yatnal in Karnataka accused the party high command of protecting internal disruptors while targeting reformists. He criticised 'Adjustment Politics'and lack of action against rebels.

KKR beat Rajasthan by eight wickets in their second match.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
Jawaharlal Nehru University: Brains trustTeaching and research go hand in hand at the institute which is proud of its activist tradition.
